sentences.en: a well-designed heating system
sentences.cn: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.en: an alarm system
sentences.cn: 警报系统

sentences.en: At work, he was chained to a system of boring meetings.
sentences.cn: 上班时，他淹没在枯燥乏味的会海中。

sentences.en: I don’t understand your filing system.
sentences.cn: 我不明白你们的归档方法。

sentences.en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.
sentences.cn: 公路系统沿线有大型商场和快餐店。

sentences.en: Normally, the transportation system in Paris carries 950,000 passengers a day.
sentences.cn: 正常情况下，巴黎的交通系统每天运送95万乘客。

sentences.en: Several of the delays were caused by the new high-tech baggage system.
sentences.cn: 几次延误都是由新的高科技行李传送系统造成的。

sentences.en: Someone cranked up the volume of the public address system.
sentences.cn: 有人调大了公共广播系统的音量。

sentences.en: The BBC has just successfully demonstrated a new digital radio transmission system.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司刚刚成功地演示了一套新的数字无线电传输系统。

sentences.en: the digestive system
sentences.cn: 消化系统

sentences.en: The new system is still in the planning stages.
sentences.cn: 新体系仍处于规划阶段。

sentences.en: The problem is compounded by the medical system here.
sentences.cn: 这儿的医疗体制使问题进一步恶化。

sentences.en: the railway system
sentences.cn: 铁路系统

sentences.en: The regions are interconnected by an excellent highway system.
sentences.cn: 那些地区通过完善的公路系统相互连接。

sentences.en: The volume of scheduled flights is straining the air traffic control system.
sentences.cn: 定期航班的数量正让空中交通指挥系统不堪重负。

sentences.en: These feelings are likely to make people attempt to overthrow the system.
sentences.cn: 这些情绪有可能促使人们想要推翻现行的体制。

sentences.en: These gases would seriously damage the patient's respiratory system.
sentences.cn: 这些毒气会严重损害患者的呼吸系统。

sentences.en: They feel strongly that their religion is incompatible with the political system.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈感受到他们的宗教信仰与政治体制不相称。

sentences.en: They said the present system of military conscription should be phased out.
sentences.cn: 他们说，当前的征兵体系应当逐步废除。

sentences.en: This works through the mediation of the central nervous system.
sentences.cn: 这是通过中枢神经系统的调节作用实现的。

sentences.en: We’ve got a good system for dealing with complaints from customers.
sentences.cn: 我们有一套处理顾客投诉的良好制度。

sentences.en: yelling is an ace way of getting stress out of your system.
sentences.cn: 大声叫喊是消除压力的一种有效方法。

words.tran_cn: 系统的；体系的；有系统的；[图情] 分类的
组织化；系统化；制度化；组织主义
系统化，体系化（systematize的过去式）
使系统化；使有秩序（等于systematize）
使系统化；使组织化；将…分类
使……系统化；把……分类；组织化

phrases.tran_cn: 经济体制；经济体系，经济系统；经济制度

phrases.phrase: get something out of one's system

phrases.tran_cn: 电网，电力系统；动力系统
水系；供水系统（等于water supply）

trans.tran_cn: 体系，制度，系统，网（络），身体
trans.tran_en: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose
